name: interloper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who becomes involved in an activity or a social group without being asked, or enters a place without permission: Security did not prevent an interloper from getting onto the stage at the opening ceremony. Synonym
intruder

Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who becomes involved in an activity or a social group without being asked or wanted, or who enters a place without being allowed: We felt like interlopers when we tried to join the game.
